languages.text: {n}Когитатор гневно плюется искрами, вид-скрин мутнеет и мигает, после чего с мстительным жужжанием выплевывает нечитаемую белиберду символов. Строптивый старец отказывается отвечать согласно запрету А403.{/n}

{n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когитатор гневно плюется искрами, вид-скрин мутнеет и мигает, после чего с мстительным жужжанием выплевывает нечитаемую белиберду символов. Строптивый старец отказывается отвечать согласно запрету А403.{/n}

{n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}

{n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fou de rage, le cogitateur vous asperge d'une pluie d'étincelles. Alors que son écran clignote et s'assombrit, vous entendez un grondement haineux et vous vous retrouvez face à un fatras de symboles incompréhensibles. Apparemment, l'esprit refuse d'obtempérer en vertu d'un quelconque « inhibiteur A403 ».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fou de rage, le cogitateur vous asperge d'une pluie d'étincelles. Alors que son écran clignote et s'assombrit, vous entendez un grondement haineux et vous vous retrouvez face à un fatras de symboles incompréhensibles. Apparemment, l'esprit refuse d'obtempérer en vertu d'un quelconque « inhibiteur A403 ».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Loco de furia, el cogitador te rocía con chispas. Mientras su videopantalla se oscurece y parpadea, oyes un zumbido rencoroso y te encuentras delante de una retahíla de símbolos incomprensibles. Al parecer, el espíritu se niega a obedecer debido a un tal «bloqueador A403».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Loco de furia, el cogitador te rocía con chispas. Mientras su videopantalla se oscurece y parpadea, oyes un zumbido rencoroso y te encuentras delante de una retahíla de símbolos incomprensibles. Al parecer, el espíritu se niega a obedecer debido a un tal «bloqueador A403».{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者愤怒不已，朝你喷射着火星。随后，你听到了充满恶意的嗡嗡声，沉思者的视讯屏幕也黯淡下来，屏幕上出现了大量无法理解的乱码符号。很显然，机魂受到“A403型数据拦截”影响，无法遵从你的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}沉思者愤怒不已，朝你喷射着火星。随后，你听到了充满恶意的嗡嗡声，沉思者的视讯屏幕也黯淡下来，屏幕上出现了大量无法理解的乱码符号。很显然，机魂受到“A403型数据拦截”影响，无法遵从你的命令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}コジテーターは怒りに身を任せ、あなたに火花を散らした。そのスクリーンが暗く明滅すると、唾を吐くようなけたたましい音が聞こえ、理解不能な記号の羅列が表示された。どうやら精霊は協力を拒んでいる。ブロッカーA403のせいらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コジテーターは怒りに身を任せ、あなたに火花を散らした。そのスクリーンが暗く明滅すると、唾を吐くようなけたたましい音が聞こえ、理解不能な記号の羅列が表示された。どうやら精霊は協力を拒んでいる。ブロッカーA403のせいらしい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator ist außer sich vor Zorn und überzieht dich mit einem Funkenregen. Sein Vid-Bildschirm verdunkelt sich und flackert, dann hörst du ein gehässiges Surren und starrst plötzlich auf ein unverständliches Durcheinander von Symbolen. Der Geist weigert sich, deinen Befehlen zu gehorchen, offenbar bedingt durch einen gewissen "Blocker A403".{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator ist außer sich vor Zorn und überzieht dich mit einem Funkenregen. Sein Vid-Bildschirm verdunkelt sich und flackert, dann hörst du ein gehässiges Surren und starrst plötzlich auf ein unverständliches Durcheinander von Symbolen. Der Geist weigert sich, deinen Befehlen zu gehorchen, offenbar bedingt durch einen gewissen "Blocker A403".{/n}

languages.text: {n}Öfkeden çılgına dönen kavramsayar, kıvılcımlar saçarak yanıt veriyor. Video ekranı sönükleşip titreşirken kin dolu bir vızıltı duyuyorsun. Ardından kendini karman çorman olmuş anlaşılmaz sembollere bakarken buluyorsun. Anlaşılan ruh, "Engelleyici A403" adındaki bir şey vasıtasıyla itaat etmeyi reddediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Beside itself with anger, the cogitator sprays you with sparks. As its vid-screen dims and flickers, you hear a spiteful whirr and find yourself staring at an incomprehensible mess of symbols. Apparently, the spirit refuses to comply on account of some "Blocker A403."{/n}
